entry.title: Tip: Using Tortoise Credentials in Git CLI
entry.content:
TortoiseGit part

  • Go to a repo
  • right button, Settings
  • Git -> Credential
  • Add a creadential
  • Config type: global
  • Helper: wincred

Sync once using your HTTPS password

CLI part

Open the $REPO/.git/config and add

[credential]
    helper = wincred

Remote git operations should not ask for credentials anymore
